description: This website supports a project funded by the European Space Agency (ESA) as part of Phase 1 of the Agency’s Climate Change Initiative (CCI) Programme. The project team will focus on: 1) Analysis of scientific requirements relating to climate; 2) Development of improved scientific algorithms; 3) Inter-comparison and selection of algorithms; 4)     System prototyping and production of SST datasets; & 5) Product validation and end-user assessment.
title: Sea Surface Temperature
